plot: Two innocent catholic school girls are abducted by a group of stoner satanists and prepared for the ultimate sacrifice. Unfortunately, Satan isn't as evil as they imagined.
title: Satan, Hold My Hand
plot_es: Two innocent catholic school girls are abducted by a group of stoner satanists and prepared for the ultimate sacrifice. Unfortunately, Satan isn't as evil as they imagined.
plot_en: Two innocent catholic school girls are abducted by a group of stoner satanists and prepared for the ultimate sacrifice. Unfortunately, Satan isn't as evil as they imagined.
